maintainers.name: Sam Warner
maintainers.bio: I am a software developer and consultant working for Black Pepper Software, a software company based in Leamington Spa, England. I'm a recent Computer Science graduate from the University of Warwick, and love all things to do with computers!

maintainers.name: Anna Weber
maintainers.bio: I used to be a health economist, and am now on my way to becoming a software engineer. Exercism's Java track got me started with open source.

maintainers.name: Jason Runkle
maintainers.bio: I have been writing Java code professionally for the past 3 years and I have had a wonderful experience with it. The functional style of Java 8 took some getting used to, but it really improved my team's codebase and productivity.

maintainers.name: Maisam Somji
maintainers.bio: I'm a full stack developer with a love for all things related to functional programming. I spend the bulk of my time solving complex problems using simple but not necessarily easy solutions.

maintainers.name: Mirko Perillo
maintainers.bio: Professional Java developer since more than 10 years. Free/Libre and Open Source Software enthusiast.

maintainers.name: Paul Moore
maintainers.bio: Agile coach and trainer focused on improving delivery through technical practices.
